Document: The Middle Length Discourses of the Buddha
Author: Bhikkhu Ñāṇamoli & Bhikkhu Bodhi
Title: Note #509
Quote: The body of Streaming Radiance is a realm of rebirth pertaining to the second jhāna, while Baka Brahmā’s realm pertains only to the first jhāna. The body of Refulgent Glory and the body of Great Fruit in the next paragraph pertain to the third and fourth jhānas.
